name: PO Vs LMS Vs Site
query:
SELECT
    po.name AS "PO No:Link/Purchase Order:150",
    po.transaction_date AS "PO Date:Date:120",
    po.supplier_name AS "Supplier Name:Data:200",
    po.custom_lms_id AS "LMS ID:Data:150",
    po.circuit_id AS "Circuit No:Data:150",
    po.rounded_total AS "PO Amount:Currency:120",
    po.status AS "PO Status:Data:100",
    po.custom_po_category AS "PO Category:Data:150",

    lms.lms_stage AS "LMS Status:Data:150",
    lms.lms_delivery_date AS "LMS Delivery Date:Date:120",

    site.site_status AS "Site Status:Data:150",
    site.date AS "Site Delivery Date:Date:120",
    site.site_name AS "Site Name:Data:200",
    site.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
    site.solution_name AS "Solution Name:Data:200",

    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pi.name SEPARATOR ', ') AS "Purchase Invoice Nos:Data:200",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pi.status SEPARATOR ', ') AS "Purchase Invoice Statuses:Data:200",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pi.custom_dutation_from SEPARATOR ', ') AS "Period From Dates:Data:200",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pi.custom_duration_to SEPARATOR ', ') AS "Period To Dates:Data:200"

FROM
    `tabPurchase Order` po

LEFT JOIN
    `tabLastmile Services Master` lms ON po.custom_lms_id = lms.name

LEFT JOIN
    `tabSite` site ON po.circuit_id = site.name

LEFT JOIN
    `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pii ON po.custom_lms_id = pii.lms_id

LEFT JOIN
    `tabPurchase Invoice` pi ON pii.parent = pi.name

GROUP BY
    po.name, po.transaction_date, po.supplier_name, po.custom_lms_id, po.circuit_id, po.rounded_total, po.status, po.custom_po_category,
    lms.lms_stage, lms.lms_delivery_date,
    site.site_status, site.date, site.site_name, site.customer, site.solution_name;
